text: The 2011 Continental Tire Sports Car Challenge was the eleventh running of the Grand-Am Cup Series, the a grand touring and touring car racing series run by the Grand American Road Racing Association. It began on January 27 and ran ten rounds. ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- ! Rnd ! Event ! Circuit !
